segments.text: Mr Jacobs ! Lovely to see you again ! What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to make a deposit please , into my granddaughter's account . It's her birthday on Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a thoughtful granddad ! Do you have her account details with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Please fill them out on this deposit slip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . How much do you want to pay in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not just a thoughtful granddad , but a generous one too .
segments.speaker: S1
